div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It has been created from a comparision of the Reims and Vatican mansucripts. A provisional apparatus has been prepared from these two manuscripts. Diplomatic transcriptions still needed to be added. Corrections and additions will then follow. Citations and cross-references still need to be added.
